Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text:
Chocolate company a very cosy place to seat and wait the train or the next metro or bus, located in the Amsterdam central station.
A very tasty chocolate drinks cold or hot also for chocolate and desserts also ‚Ä¶

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text:
Try it!

Such nice service and a quality coffee & chocolate. ‚Ä¶

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text: Nice cafe

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text:
This is a feel good store.
50 flavors of hot chocolate to drink there or for take away. You can buy chocolate spoons for home as well. I enjoyed a mid size cup of white hit chocolate , because you rarely find white one in regular coffee shops.

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text: I wasn‚Äôt sure how the selection process worked with all of the flavors of hot chocolate but the staff was very friendly and explained it. The place isn‚Äôt big but was very nice. It didn‚Äôt take long to get the hot chocolate and I‚Äôve never had it served so nicely before.

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text: Wide variety of chocolate tastes, they also have coffee. You can have a sit and enjoy your drink there.

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text: Came here on 3 separate occasions during our 4 day stay when passing through centraal. Friendly staff and fast service. Great coffee served with either a biscuit or truffle (we both had the truffles each time and they were delicious!). Will come back here for coffee when passing through centraal over the Starbucks.

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text: Prices were reasonable (seeing as it is in the main train station) and the choice of hot chocolates is massive! We went for the Irish hot chocolate and the ginger and lemongrass Hot chocolate. Both were extremely tasty. You pick your ‚Ä¶

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text: One of the best cappuccino in town. Served with a small chocolate. Really appreciate it!

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text: It is a small place. They have high tables and chairs only. So it is not a good choice for people with wheelchairs. We were there quite early on Sunday morning about 9:30, there was no other guest. I had a cup 'latte macchiato' chocolate. It was very good. Cost ‚Ç¨3.90 - in 250ml cup.

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text: My girlfriend wanted to get a hot chocolate on a Friday. We arrived around 21:15 h. to find the shop closed. We checked the website beforehand and it clearly stated the shop should be open until 22:00 h. We pointed this out to an employee ‚Ä¶

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text: Good coffee...super high chairs that are difficult for short legged people to get into

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text:
Had many got chocolate before but nothing beats the chocolate company
Best got chocolate drink ever!!!!!

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text: Don't bother ordering and expect what you ordered to be delivered. Asked for a deliver with no nuts in for a very ill colleague, what arrived? A whole delivery with nuts in the chocolate. I'd ask for money back but if that arrives the way the delivery did......  why bother.....

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text: Delicious chocos and amazing coffee with a kind and nice staff. It's always worth to stop by for a relaxed moment and coffee.

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text: i like the blue hair barista

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text: Extremely rude and impatient and put the wrong tags for the dark chocolates. Will never buy chocolates here again! The crew at the haarlem shop are so much more friendly.

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text: We got know occasionally about their hot chocolate.  We ended going their everything to warm up our body with their delicious options to flavor your milk.

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text: I got the "hotchocspoon" in a take-away cup. It was nice ... once it melted and blended. At first I was only drinking hot milk.

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text: Nice and cosy place with superb hot chocolate. Especially recommend plain chocolate Truffles and the lemon grass hot chocolate.

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text: Got charged 8 euro for two drinks. I asked for two large and I got one small and one large. Didn‚Äôt get refund or anything.

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text: Best coffee in Amsterdam! I always ask for a shot of chocolate in my cappuccino. Order a medium, the size and cost are worth it.

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text:
Great coffee and service as well !!!
I have been there several times but I couldn‚Äôt mention the excellent service that I had today from Emily,really sweet,friendly and very professional!!! Thanks you Emily !!!

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text:

This place is for you!

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text: Really great selection of tempting treats. You'll wish you could get a taste of everything.

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text: I stood there for a couple of minutes while the two young ladies working there were chitchatting. Even though they noticed me, did not pay any attention. Luckily there are other places in the station. Hasta nunca!

Name: Chocolate Company
Review Text: Good variety of chocolate milk flavours and tasted great.

Name: Chocolate Company

Name: Chocolate Company
